text: Marco Audisio (born 29 July 1975) is an Italian rower. He competed in the men's lightweight double sculls event at the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Italy Category:Rowers at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Lombardy
title: Marco Audisio
